original_text: “When he was forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brothers, the children of Israel.
korean_text: 나이가 사십이 되매 그 형제 이스라엘 자손을 돌볼 생각이 나더니

sentences.original_text: When he was forty years old
it came into his heart to visit his brothers
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 형제들을 방문하고 싶은 마음이 생겼습니다
